topics.title: Describe Your Hotel Stay
topics.prompt: Describe your last stay at a hotel. Where was it and what did you do there?
topics.hint: 請用3~5句描述你上一個飯店住宿經驗，包含位置和活動。
topics.sample: Last year, I stayed at a hotel near the beach. The room was comfortable and had a nice view. I enjoyed swimming and eating at the hotel restaurant.

topics.title: Ask for Directions
topics.prompt: Imagine you need to find a pharmacy. How would you ask someone for directions in English?
topics.hint: 請用1~2句英文問路語句，模擬找藥局。
topics.sample: Excuse me, could you tell me how to get to the nearest pharmacy? I need to buy some medicine.

topics.title: Giving Directions
topics.prompt: Give someone directions from a hotel to a nearby bank using simple English.
topics.hint: 請用3~4句說明從飯店到銀行的路線。
topics.sample: Go straight ahead and then turn right at the corner. Walk two blocks and you will see the bank next to the park.

topics.title: Expressing Feelings
topics.prompt: How do you feel when you finally find your hotel room after a long trip? Say it in English.
topics.hint: 用3~4句表達找到飯店房間後的感受。
topics.sample: I feel relieved and happy. After a long trip, it's nice to finally rest in a comfortable room.

topics.title: Describe a Surprise
topics.prompt: Talk about a time when someone surprised you during a trip. What happened?
topics.hint: 用3~5句描述旅途中收到的驚喜事件。
topics.sample: On my last trip, my friend rented a car to pick me up. It was a big surprise because I didn’t expect it at all.

topics.title: Explain How to Use an Elevator
topics.prompt: Explain to a friend how to get to the second floor using an elevator.
topics.hint: 用簡單英文步驟說明如何搭電梯到二樓。
topics.sample: Take the elevator on the left side. Press the button for the second floor. When you get off, turn left to find the room.

topics.title: Talk About Shopping Malls
topics.prompt: Describe a shopping mall you have visited. What shops or activities did it have?
topics.hint: 用3~5句英文介紹你去過的購物中心和它的特色。
topics.sample: The shopping mall I visited had many stores like clothes shops and a cinema. There was also a food court with different kinds of food.

topics.title: Describe Directions with Landmarks
topics.prompt: Use landmarks to describe how to get from a post office to an amusement park.
topics.hint: 用地標描述從郵局到遊樂園的路線，3~4句。
topics.sample: From the post office, walk to the crosswalk near the restaurant. Cross the street and go straight past the clown statue. Then you will see the fountain and the amusement park is nearby.

topics.title: Talk About Needing Help
topics.prompt: Describe a time you needed help finding a place. What did you do?
topics.hint: 用3~4句說明找路時你如何尋求幫助。
topics.sample: I was lost and needed to find the restroom. I asked a stranger politely and they gave me clear directions.

topics.title: Plan a Dinner After Sightseeing
topics.prompt: Imagine you are tired after sightseeing. What would you say to your friend about dinner plans?
topics.hint: 用3~4句英文說明觀光後準備吃晚餐的計劃與感受。
topics.sample: I'm tired from walking around. Let's go back to the hotel and have dinner there. I’m looking forward to relaxing and eating a good meal.
